item.title: Mavericks vs. Spurs: Game 1
item.description: Tim Duncan finishes with 27 points, Tony Parker adds 21 and the Spurs take Game 1 over the Mavericks 90-85.
item.player: Dirk Nowitzki, Monta Ellis, Devin Harris, Vince Carter, Brandan Wright, Kawhi Leonard, Tim Duncan, Tony Parker, Manu Ginobili
item.tags: San Antonio, Spurs, Dallas, Mavericks, game, recap, Dirk Nowitzki, Monta Ellis, Devin Harris, Vince Carter, Brandan Wright, Kawhi Leonard, Tim Duncan, Tony Parker, Manu Ginobili

item.title: Bobcats vs. Heat: Game 1
item.description: LeBron James has 27 points and nine rebounds, Dwyane Wade finishes with 23 and the Heat beat the Bobcats in Game 1 99-88.
item.player: Josh McRoberts, Al Jefferson, Kemba Walker, Gary Neal, LeBron James, Chris Bosh, Dwyane Wade, James Jones
item.tags: Miami, Heat, Charlotte, Bobcats, game 1, recap, Josh McRoberts, Al Jefferson, Kemba Walker, Gary Neal, LeBron James, Chris Bosh, Dwyane Wade, James Jones
